pli-tv-bi-vb-pc26:2.1.8: The six are linen, cotton, silk, wool, sunn hemp, and hemp, see [pli-tv-kd8:3.1.6](). According to [pli-tv-kd8:21.1.4]() the size referred to here is no smaller than 8 by 4 _sugataṅgula_, “standard fingerbreadths”. For an explanation of the idea of _vikappanā_, see the Appendix of Technical Terms.
